bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for General Requirements for Dry-Type Distribution and Power Transformers
IEEE Draft Standard for General Requirements for Dry-Type Distribution and Power Transformers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Electrical, mechanical, and safety requirements of ventilated, non-ventilated, and sealed dry-type distribution and power transformers or autotransformers (single and polyphase, with a voltage of 601 V or higher in the highest voltage winding) are described.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.12.01-2015 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.01-2005)
